verses.plain: Rejoice in the LORD, O ye righteous: for praise is comely for the upright.

tokens.t: Rejoice in the
, O ye righteous:
praise is comely for the upright.

verses.plain: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.

tokens.t: Praise the
with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery
an instrument of ten strings.

verses.plain: Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.

tokens.t: Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.

verses.plain: For the word of the LORD is right; and all his works are done in truth.

tokens.t: For the word of the
right; and all his works
in truth.

verses.plain: He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the LORD.

tokens.t: He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the

verses.plain: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.

tokens.t: By the word of the
were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.

verses.plain: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap: he layeth up the depth in storehouses.

tokens.t: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap: he layeth up the depth in storehouses.

verses.plain: Let all the earth fear the LORD: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.

tokens.t: Let all the earth fear the
: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.

verses.plain: For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast.

tokens.t: For he spake, and it was
he commanded, and it stood fast.

verses.plain: The LORD bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.

tokens.t: The
bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.

verses.plain: The counsel of the LORD standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.

tokens.t: The counsel of the
standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.

verses.plain: Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD; and the people whom he hath chosen for his own inheritance.

tokens.t: Blessed
the nation whose God
the
the people
he hath chosen for his own inheritance.

verses.plain: The LORD looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.

tokens.t: The
looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.

verses.plain: From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth.

tokens.t: From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth.

verses.plain: He fashioneth their hearts alike; he considereth all their works.

tokens.t: He fashioneth their hearts alike; he considereth all their works.

verses.plain: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength.

tokens.t: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength.

verses.plain: An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.

tokens.t: An horse
a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver
by his great strength.

verses.plain: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;

tokens.t: Behold, the eye of the
upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;

verses.plain: To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.

tokens.t: To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.

verses.plain: Our soul waiteth for the LORD: he is our help and our shield.

tokens.t: Our soul waiteth for the
: he
our help and our shield.

verses.plain: For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.

tokens.t: For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.

verses.plain: Let thy mercy, O LORD, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.

tokens.t: Let thy mercy, O
, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.

footnotes.text: to all…: Heb. to generation and generation
